name: Bryan Maciel de Almeida
goals: My goal is to establish myself as a complete and strategic developer, capable of delivering digital solutions that combine high technical performance, product vision, and real business impact. I constantly seek challenging projects that allow me to expand my capacity in analysis, programming, and systems architecture, always focusing on efficiency, scalability, and innovation. I’m not interested in mechanical task execution: my commitment is to understand the context, anticipate problems, and propose improvements that generate real value. I want to work in environments that value speed, adaptability, and tangible results, not just process compliance. I’m in continuous development, both technically — specializing in back-end, API integration, AI, and automation — and strategically, with skills in agile project management and product-oriented thinking. In the coming years, I aim to lead initiatives that surpass traditional development standards, implementing smart solutions that challenge the market and position me as a tech and innovation reference. In the medium term, I intend to work on global projects, mainly in ecosystems focused on system optimization, scalable platform development, and new digital product creation.
experiences: Automation and Tax Calculation Projects with Python
Interface Design with HTML and CSS
Simple Game Development with Programming Logic
